EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-12-12-NYC.EMAIL-No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}} Sorry to have missed you at {{my.Event Title:default=}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re sorry to have missed you at last night’s {{my.Event Title:default=IT Networking Event}}.
Although we weren’t able to speak with you, we wanted to let you know about our upcoming webinars so you can catch up on all things new with Turbonomic. See our upcoming schedule here <[[turbonomic.com/webinars]]>!
Don’t hesitate to reach out if you have questions. We hope to see you at another Turbonomic event soon!
Sincerely, The Turbonomic Team
